item.title: Report X-2025041489
item.description:
Report X-2025041489

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-23T00:57:51+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-15
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO OF DELAWARE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: LEAKER FOUND IN DMP HAZMAT AUDIT AREA. LEAKER WAS RESPONDED TOO BY RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER USED THE DECSION TREE WHICH LED TO THE CORROSIVE RESPONSE SHEET. RESPONDER CLEANED UP THE SPILL FOLLOWING GUIDLINES IN RESPONSE SHEET. RESPONDER BROUGHT LEAKER BACK TO THE DMP.

item.title: Report X-2025041365
item.description:
Report X-2025041365

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-23T00:57:51+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-14
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO OF DELAWARE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: UNLOAD SUPERVISOR CALLED IN A LEAKER TO THE DMP AND DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKER. RESPONDER USED THE DECSION TREE WHICH LED TO THE FLAMMABLE LIQUID RESPONSE SHEET. RESPONDER CLEANED UP SPILL FOLLOWING GUIDLINES IN RESPONSE SHEET. RESPONDER BROUGHT THE LEAKER BACK TO THE DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL.

item.description:
Report X-2025041343

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-18T21:15:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-12
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE COMPANY (UPSCO)
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS DISPATCHED OUT FOR A LEAKING PACKAGE AT DOOR 67. RESPONDER PICKED UP THE LEAKING PACKAGE AND BROUGHT IT BACK TO THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. RESPONDER NOTED THAT 1 OF THE 4 BOTTLES WAS LEAKING.

item.title: Report X-2025041350
item.description:
Report X-2025041350

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-18T21:15:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-12
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE COMPANY (UPSCO)
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS DISPATCHED TO A LEAKING HAZMAT ON THE PD7/8 IRREG BELT. USING ALL REQUIRED PPE, PLACED THE PACKAGE IN A LINED SPILL TUB. ALCOHOL EVAPORATED SO THERE WAS NO ABSORBENT REQUIRED. PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2025040090
item.description:
Report X-2025040090

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-18T21:15:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-21
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AMAZON PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED LEAKING, RESPONDED TO BY DESIGNATED RESPONDER. ON DAMAGE INSPECTION DESIGNATED RESPONDER DISCOVERED INTERNAL CARTON WAS HAZMARKED WITH UPS SHIPPING PAPERS, CLASS 2.2 DIAMOND HAZARD LABEL, AND UN NUMBER/PSN UN3164, ARTICLES, PRESSURIZED, PNUMATIC. SHIPMENT WAS CONTAINERIZED AND HELD PER UNDECLARED HAZMAT PROCEDURES.
